nodes.excerpt: Getting attention for your startup is not easy, but our platform makes it simple. EllisX connects startups with high-quality podcasts, writers and speaking engagements based on mutual interest. Connect with them in 2 clicks. Yes, it’s that easy.
nodes.title: EllisX 2.0 - The easiest way to spread the word about your startup
nodes.author: KP

localize.description: 让你的创业公司获得关注并不容易，但我们的平台让它变得简单。EllisX根据双方的兴趣，将初创公司与高质量的播客、作家和演讲活动联系起来。只需点击2次即可与他们联系。是的，就这么简单。
localize.tagline: 传播创业公司信息的最简单方式

localize.description: 讓你的創業公司獲得關注並不容易，但我們的平臺讓它變得簡單。EllisX根據雙方的興趣，將初創公司與高質量的播客、作家和演講活動聯繫起來。只需點擊2次即可與他們聯繫。是的，就這麼簡單。
localize.tagline: 傳播創業公司信息的最簡單方式

nodes.excerpt: Rent Smart. Rest Easy. Renting can feel like you're not in control. Learn and share about the experiences that others have had. A large portion of your income goes to rent. Increase the transparency available to know where you're investing your money.
nodes.title: Good Neighbour - Share your rental experience for future tenants.
nodes.author: Drew Minns

localize.description: 出租斯马特。睡觉很容易。租房会让人觉得你无法掌控。学习和分享别人的经验。你收入的很大一部分都花在房租上了。提高透明度，让你知道你的钱投到了哪里。
localize.tagline: 与未来的租户分享您的租房体验。

localize.description: 出租斯馬特。睡覺很容易。租房會讓人覺得你無法掌控。學習和分享別人的經驗。你收入的很大一部分都花在房租上了。提高透明度，讓你知道你的錢投到了哪裏。
localize.tagline: 與未來的租戶分享您的租房體驗。

nodes.excerpt: Craftgate, a cloud-based payment gateway, provides you safe processing through a single integration and allows you on growing your business.
nodes.title: Craftgate - Cloud-based payment gateway
nodes.author: Hakan ERDOGAN

localize.description: Craftgate是一个基于云的支付网关，通过单次集成为您提供安全的处理，让您的业务不断发展。
localize.tagline: 基于云的支付网关

localize.description: Craftgate是一個基於雲的支付網關，通過單次集成爲您提供安全的處理，讓您的業務不斷髮展。
localize.tagline: 基於雲的支付網關

nodes.excerpt: Baaz enables live video commerce for retailers globally. A retail store can host live videos, manage catalogs, live chats, payments, shipping, promotions and influencers from Baaz app. All things related to live video shopping in one place.
nodes.title: Baaz - Create virtual showroom in less than 1 min & sell online
nodes.author: Chitresh Parihar

localize.description: Baaz为全球零售商提供现场视频商务服务。零售店可以托管实时视频，管理目录，实时聊天，支付，送货，促销和Baaz应用程序的影响力。所有与视频直播购物相关的东西都集中在一个地方。
localize.tagline: 在不到1分钟的时间内创建虚拟展厅并在线销售

localize.description: Baaz爲全球零售商提供現場視頻商務服務。零售店可以託管實時視頻，管理目錄，實時聊天，支付，送貨，促銷和Baaz應用程序的影響力。所有與視頻直播購物相關的東西都集中在一個地方。
localize.tagline: 在不到1分鐘的時間內創建虛擬展廳並在線銷售

nodes.excerpt: Startup Job Watch is a weekly updating database of over 6000 jobs from the top startups in the world. These are all companies that were on the best of lists from publications like Business Insider, Linkedin, AngelList, and more!
nodes.title: Startup Job Watch - Database of 6000+ jobs from the top startups in the world
nodes.author: Henry Johnson

localize.description: Startup Job Watch是一个每周更新的数据库，其中包含来自世界顶级初创公司的6000多个工作岗位。这些都是来自Business Insider、LinkedIn、AngelList等出版物的最佳公司名单！
localize.tagline: 包含全球顶尖初创企业6000多个职位的数据库

localize.description: Startup Job Watch是一個每週更新的數據庫，其中包含來自世界頂級初創公司的6000多個工作崗位。這些都是來自Business Insider、LinkedIn、AngelList等出版物的最佳公司名單！
localize.tagline: 包含全球頂尖初創企業6000多個職位的數據庫

nodes.excerpt: Fundraising Hours is an effortless office hour event connecting early-stage founders fundraising remotely. The founders can get notified when the investors open their office hours. Powered by Remotehour.
nodes.title: Fundraising Hours - Remotely connecting founders with committed investors
nodes.author: Shun Yamada

localize.description: 筹款时间是一项毫不费力的办公时间活动，将早期创始人远程筹款联系起来。当投资者开放办公时间时，创始人可以得到通知。由RemoteHour提供动力。
localize.tagline: 远程连接创始人与忠诚的投资者

localize.description: 籌款時間是一項毫不費力的辦公時間活動，將早期創始人遠程籌款聯繫起來。當投資者開放辦公時間時，創始人可以得到通知。由RemoteHour提供動力。
localize.tagline: 遠程連接創始人與忠誠的投資者

nodes.excerpt: Learn Azure Fundamentals is an app which helps you to learn the basics of Microsoft Azure and Cloud Computing by answering questions in tests. App contains 14 unique tests, 269 questions, 132 articles. Learn offline. App is absolutely free. No Ads.
nodes.title: Learn Azure Fundmentals - Learn Microsfot Azure fundamentals by passing tests
nodes.author: Denis Kazakov

localize.description: 学习Azure基础知识是一款应用程序，它通过在测试中回答问题来帮助你学习Microsoft Azure和云计算的基础知识。APP包含14个独特的测试，269个问题，132篇文章。离线学习。APP是绝对免费的。没有广告。
localize.tagline: 通过测试学习Microsfot Azure基础知识

localize.description: 學習Azure基礎知識是一款應用程序，它通過在測試中回答問題來幫助你學習Microsoft Azure和雲計算的基礎知識。APP包含14個獨特的測試，269個問題，132篇文章。離線學習。APP是絕對免費的。沒有廣告。
localize.tagline: 通過測試學習Microsfot Azure基礎知識

nodes.excerpt: It’s a fun & easy solution for you and your friends to find the best movie or TV-show to watch on Netflix. Swipe through media name cards. If all your friends like the same movie, it's a match! Less scrolling more watching
nodes.title: Couchers - Less scrolling more watching.
nodes.author: Ali Raza Noorani

localize.description: 对于你和你的朋友来说，在Netflix上找到最好的电影或电视节目观看是一个有趣而简单的解决方案。刷过媒体名片。如果你所有的朋友都喜欢同一部电影，那就很配了！更少的滚动，更多的观看
localize.tagline: 更少的滚动，更多的观看。

localize.tagline: 更少的滾動，更多的觀看。

nodes.excerpt: Access your favourite Websites and Web Apps easily and quickly. Save the websites addresses and give them a custom name and icon, then easily access them from the Menu Bar or in an Always-on-Top window. Freely resize the menu window for a better experience
nodes.title: Surf - Access any website or web app from menu bar/floating window
nodes.author: Lucian Boiangiu

localize.description: 轻松快速地访问您喜爱的网站和Web应用程序。保存网站地址并为其指定自定义名称和图标，然后从菜单栏或始终在顶部的窗口轻松访问它们。可自由调整菜单窗口的大小以获得更好的体验
localize.tagline: 从菜单栏/浮动窗口访问任何网站或Web应用程序

localize.description: 輕鬆快速地訪問您喜愛的網站和Web應用程序。保存網站地址併爲其指定自定義名稱和圖標，然後從菜單欄或始終在頂部的窗口輕鬆訪問它們。可自由調整菜單窗口的大小以獲得更好的體驗
localize.tagline: 從菜單欄/浮動窗口訪問任何網站或Web應用程序

nodes.excerpt: Findnlink is a platform where you can share your projects and find co-founders/members. - Customize your project page - Create your own portfolio / profile - Show your skills We want to make Findnlink a great virtual workspace to connect teams together 👌

localize.tagline: 在你的想法上找到可以合作的人。

localize.tagline: 在你的想法上找到可以合作的人。

nodes.excerpt: Invoicer is a document based invoice maker app available exclusively on iOS/iPadOS/macOS platforms. All your invoice files and preferences are stored in iCloud so you can work seemlessly across different devices without the need to create an account for syncing.
nodes.title: Invoicer - Document based invoice maker app for iOS/iPadOS/macOS
nodes.author: Alex

localize.description: Invoice是一个基于文档的发票制作应用程序，仅在iOS/iPadOS/MacOS平台上可用。您的所有发票文件和首选项都存储在iCloud中，因此您可以跨不同设备无缝工作，而无需创建用于同步的帐户。
localize.tagline: 适用于iOS/iPadOS/MacOS的基于文档的发票生成器应用程序

localize.description: Invoice是一個基於文檔的發票製作應用程序，僅在iOS/iPadOS/MacOS平臺上可用。您的所有發票文件和首選項都存儲在iCloud中，因此您可以跨不同設備無縫工作，而無需創建用於同步的帳戶。
localize.tagline: 適用於iOS/iPadOS/MacOS的基於文檔的發票生成器應用程序

nodes.excerpt: Daily-curated Remote Jobs for Everyone Features: - simple list (Hacker News style) - simple & fast search powered by Algolia - only the latest jobs from the last 30 days - no long descriptions, just simple titles and links - no ads - simple email newsletter
nodes.title: Remotelane 3.0 - Remote jobs for everyone with the most simple ux and search
nodes.author: ronatory

localize.description: 每日-为每个人策划的远程工作功能：-简单列表(黑客新闻风格)-由Algolia提供支持的简单快速搜索-仅限过去30天的最新工作-没有详细描述，只有简单的标题和链接-没有广告-简单的电子邮件时事通讯
localize.tagline: 通过最简单的用户体验和搜索，为每个人提供远程作业

localize.description: 每日-爲每個人策劃的遠程工作功能：-簡單列表(黑客新聞風格)-由Algolia提供支持的簡單快速搜索-僅限過去30天的最新工作-沒有詳細描述，只有簡單的標題和鏈接-沒有廣告-簡單的電子郵件時事通訊

nodes.excerpt: For anyone wanting to improve their wellness and achieve their goals, the HistoricalMe app is your private, online space that makes it simple to record and track all elements of your daily life. Find out more about you with this diary app in 2021.
nodes.title: HistoricalMe - Diarise, organise and realise.
nodes.author: John Kellett

localize.description: 对于任何想要改善健康和实现目标的人来说，HistoricalMe应用程序是你的私人在线空间，可以方便地记录和跟踪你日常生活的所有要素。2021年使用这款日记应用了解更多关于你的信息。
localize.tagline: 分化、组织和实现。

localize.description: 對於任何想要改善健康和實現目標的人來說，HistoricalMe應用程序是你的私人在線空間，可以方便地記錄和跟蹤你日常生活的所有要素。2021年使用這款日記應用瞭解更多關於你的信息。
localize.tagline: 分化、組織和實現。

nodes.excerpt: Niceboard is the easiest way to start your own niche job board business, without writing a single line of code. Set up your board in minutes, connect your own domain, view real-time application stats, backfill jobs, translate it, use the private API and more!
nodes.title: Niceboard 2.0 - Start a job board. No code required.
nodes.author: Olivier

localize.description: Niceboard是开始你自己的利基职位板业务的最简单的方式，而不需要编写一行代码。在几分钟内设置您的主板，连接您自己的域，查看实时应用程序统计信息，回填作业，翻译它，使用私有API等等！
localize.tagline: 创建一个求职公告板。不需要代码。

localize.description: Niceboard是開始你自己的利基職位板業務的最簡單的方式，而不需要編寫一行代碼。在幾分鐘內設置您的主板，連接您自己的域，查看實時應用程序統計信息，回填作業，翻譯它，使用私有API等等！
localize.tagline: 創建一個求職公告板。不需要代碼。

nodes.excerpt: A list of 9,000 badly executed products and apps. Are you looking for project ideas? Then this list could be useful to you. - 2,599 iOS Apps - 1,226 Chrome Extensions - 240 Web Apps (from ProductHunt) - 4,999 Android Apps Airtable access + JSON files

nodes.excerpt: Privacy policies and data request forms SHOULD be easy to find, but many companies hide them deep in their UI. Privacy hunt is a simple, free, crowd-sourced repository to reduce that to 1 click! 😁 Find a company, click on the link, and reclaim YOUR data. 🙌
nodes.title: Privacy Hunt - We hunt data request forms, so you can reclaim YOUR data.
nodes.author: Robert Thelen

localize.description: 隐私政策和数据请求表应该很容易找到，但许多公司将它们隐藏在用户界面的深处。Privacy Hunt是一个简单、免费、众包的存储库，只需单击一次即可！😁找到一家公司，单击链接，然后回收您的数据。🙌
localize.tagline: 我们寻找数据请求表，这样您就可以回收您的数据。

localize.description: 隱私政策和數據請求表應該很容易找到，但許多公司將它們隱藏在用戶界面的深處。Privacy Hunt是一個簡單、免費、衆包的存儲庫，只需單擊一次即可！😁找到一家公司，單擊鏈接，然後回收您的數據。🙌
localize.tagline: 我們尋找數據請求表，這樣您就可以回收您的數據。

nodes.excerpt: Culturely empowers your people with better culture to improve performance and enhance organizational growth. It also brings managers and employees together using 🎯 OKRs, 🎭 1:1 Meetings and other best-in-class tools.

nodes.excerpt: Help your friends get a job by embedding a widget on your website where you point visitors to your friends for jobs that you're not available for. Create your widget in the online generator and embed it on your website using an iframe. It's as simple as that.
nodes.title: Referrer - Painlessly refer your friends for jobs
nodes.author: Albin Groen

localize.description: 通过在你的网站上嵌入一个小工具来帮助你的朋友找到一份工作，在那里你可以把访问者引导到你的朋友那里，寻找你找不到的工作。在在线生成器中创建您的小部件，并使用IFRAME将其嵌入到您的网站上。就这么简单。

localize.description: -推薦人職業生涯是一種工具，可以最大限度地增加你獲得任何尋找候選人的公司空缺的機會。-聯繫目前在公司工作的員工，他們願意推薦潛在的候選人來填補職位空缺。
localize.tagline: 推薦的在線數據庫

nodes.excerpt: IOON is an innovative technology that helps you turn drinking water into a sanitizer with help of silver particles. It is safe for kids, pets, people with allergies and can be even used on food. It’s portable, stylish and you can recycle it!
nodes.title: IOON - Smart device that turns water into sanitizer.
nodes.author: Pavlo Pedenko

localize.description: IOON是一项创新技术，在银粒子的帮助下，它可以帮助你将饮用水变成消毒剂。它对儿童、宠物和过敏者都是安全的，甚至可以用在食物上。它是便携的，时髦的，你可以回收利用！
localize.tagline: 把水变成消毒剂的智能设备。

localize.description: IOON是一項創新技術，在銀粒子的幫助下，它可以幫助你將飲用水變成消毒劑。它對兒童、寵物和過敏者都是安全的，甚至可以用在食物上。它是便攜的，時髦的，你可以回收利用！
localize.tagline: 把水變成消毒劑的智能設備。

nodes.excerpt: https://easyqr.menu/ is a fully self-hosted, all-in-one QR Code Stores platform. ☑️ Online payments via Paypal, Stripe ☑️ Integrated proper analytics ☑️ SEO ready, lightweight and performant store pages ☑️ Highly customizable store pages and many more..
nodes.title: EasyQR - Create self-hosted, lightweight QR code menus
nodes.author: Fabian

localize.description: https://easyqr.menu/是一个完全自主托管的一体式二维码存储平台。☑️在线支付通过贝宝，条带☑️集成适当的分析☑️搜索引擎优化准备，轻量级和高性能的商店页面☑️高度可定制的商店页面和更多。

localize.tagline: 創建自託管的輕量級二維碼菜單

nodes.excerpt: Imagine all the money we could unlock by selling subscriptions that we bought but don't really use anymore. flipp is a platform to post your pre-owned subscriptions for sale. we already have 500+ users interested in buying pre-owned subscriptions at unloved.
nodes.title: flipp - Sell subscriptions you no longer need
nodes.author: Nitish Rathee

localize.description: 想象一下，我们可以通过出售我们购买但不再真正使用的订阅来解锁所有的钱。Flipp是一个发布二手订阅以供出售的平台。我们已经有500多名用户有兴趣在unLove购买二手订阅。
localize.tagline: 销售您不再需要的订阅

localize.description: 想象一下，我們可以通過出售我們購買但不再真正使用的訂閱來解鎖所有的錢。Flipp是一個發佈二手訂閱以供出售的平臺。我們已經有500多名用戶有興趣在unLove購買二手訂閱。
localize.tagline: 銷售您不再需要的訂閱
